name: Feed Extensions
author: Adam Hopkinson

sections.description:
Feed Extensions allows you to add any text or html to the bottom of the footer. Tags such as [blog_name], [blog_url] or [year] can be inserted.

This is my first plugin on WordPress/Extend – I’d be grateful of any suggestions on how to improve the plugin. Thanks!
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin
  2. Upload the folder /feedx/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Edit the inserted text on the Settings → Feed Extensions page

short_description: Feed Extensions allows you to put footer text at the bottom of each post in your feed.
